TopicTitle: New bug when going to launchpad from VAB - multiple saves

Articles.Content:
As the title says, I was playing fine, made it to the mun, was putting together a resupply mission (didn't have enough fuel to return from the mun) and when I went to launch, I got this, my ship seemed to be floating or moving, if I try to goto spacecenter, it warns me that I'm moving and can only revert to last save, if I revert to launch, I get this again, if I revert to VAB it goes back to the VAB just fine, I can then return to spacecenter and visit the other buildings just fine. But 2 different saves even just launching a command pod all do this now. I can zoom and rotate around like normal. Can't launch, can't change any staging.

Mods I have installed:

btw, I've tried to only install mods that have been updated to .90

Mechjeb2

All mods from Bob Palmer/UmbraSpaceIndustries - this installes firespitter, which gives me an out of date mod warning on loading.

KAS

Infernal Robotics

RCSBuildAid

WorkingMultipleStarSystems
Please see the stickies on what info you need to provide, we cannot diagnose this issue without more information, sorry.
